named-query.name: Pedido.findAllByParameters
named-query.query: select o from Pedido o where (:id is NULL or o.id = :id) and (:empresa is NULL or o.empresa = :empresa) ORDER BY o.dataPedido

named-query.name: Pedido.findQuantityAllByParameters
named-query.query: select count(o.id) from Pedido o where (:id is NULL or o.id = :id) and (:empresa is NULL or o.empresa = :empresa) ORDER BY o.dataPedido
